Bel canto.definition: A style of singing that emphasizes beauty of tone and brilliant technique. The term is often used to describe the Italian opera of the 18th and early 19th centuries.
Bel canto.zh-CN: 美声唱法，始于16世纪意大利，完成于19世纪的艺术性很高的唱法，用于意大利歌剧。
Bel canto.zh: 美聲唱法，始於16世紀意大利，完成於19世紀的藝術性很高的唱法，用於意大利歌劇。

Bravo.definition: A cry of congratulation to a male singer or performer. (Masc. pl. bravi; fem. sing. brava; fem. pl. brave.) The use of ! after a written expression of Bravo/a/i/e(!) strongly emphasizes it.
Bravo.zh-CN: 对表演者表示祝贺的呼喊。
Bravo.zh: 對表演者表示祝賀的呼喊。
